mapper.select: select material_id,light_fix_id from material_light_fix where material_id = #{material_id}
select group_concat(description) from material_light_fix mlf JOIN light_fix lf ON mlf.light_fix_id = lf.light_fix_id where material_id = #{material_id}
select material_id, line_id, position_id, sign_position_id, prev_position_id, next_position_id from material_process_assign where material_id = #{material_id}
mapper.insert: insert material_process_assign ( material_id, line_id, position_id, sign_position_id, prev_position_id, next_position_id ) values ( #{material_id}, #{line_id}, #{position_id}, #{sign_position_id}, #{prev_position_id}, #{next_position_id} )
mapper.select: SELECT 2 as REFER_TYPE, material_id, LINE_ID, POSITION_ID, SIGN_POSITION_ID, PREV_POSITION_ID, NEXT_POSITION_ID FROM material_process_assign WHERE material_id = #{material_id} AND NOT (PREV_POSITION_ID = 0 AND NEXT_POSITION_ID = 0);

SELECT `pa`.POSITION_ID as POSITION_ID, `p`.PROCESS_CODE as PROCESS_CODE, `pa`.line_id as line_id FROM material_process_assign pa LEFT JOIN POSITION p ON `pa`.POSITION_ID = `p`.POSITION_ID JOIN material_process_assign spa ON `pa`.material_id = `spa`.material_id AND `pa`.NEXT_POSITION_ID = `spa`.sign_position_id WHERE `pa`.material_id = #{material_id} AND `spa`.POSITION_ID = #{position_id} ORDER BY `p`.PROCESS_CODE;

SELECT `pa`.POSITION_ID as POSITION_ID, `p`.PROCESS_CODE as PROCESS_CODE, `pa`.line_id as line_id, `p`.light_division_flg FROM material_process_assign pa LEFT JOIN POSITION p ON `pa`.POSITION_ID = `p`.POSITION_ID JOIN material_process_assign spa ON `pa`.material_id = `spa`.material_id AND `pa`.PREV_POSITION_ID = `spa`.sign_position_id WHERE `pa`.material_id = #{material_id} AND `spa`.POSITION_ID = #{position_id} ORDER BY `p`.PROCESS_CODE;

SELECT 2 AS REFER_TYPE, material_id as REFER_ID, LINE_ID, POSITION_ID, SIGN_POSITION_ID, PREV_POSITION_ID, NEXT_POSITION_ID FROM material_process_assign WHERE material_id = #{material_id} AND POSITION_ID = #{position_id};
SELECT position_id FROM material_process_assign p WHERE material_id = #{material_id} AND line_id = #{line_id} AND prev_position_id = 0;
SELECT position_id FROM material_process_assign p WHERE material_id = #{material_id} AND line_id = #{line_id};

select mpa.material_id, pos.line_id, count(mpa.position_id) = count(pf.position_id) as inline_flg, mp.finish_date as name from material_process_assign mpa join position pos on mpa.position_id = pos.position_id left join production_feature pf on mpa.material_id = pf.material_id and mpa.position_id = pf.position_id and pf.operate_result = 2 left join material_process mp on mpa.material_id = mp.material_id and pos.line_id = mp.line_id where mpa.material_id = #{material_id} group by pos.line_id ;

select pos.process_code from material_process_assign mps join position pos on mps.position_id = pos.position_id where material_id = #{material_id} and sign_position_id = #{position_id} and prev_position_id = 0 and next_position_id = 0 order by pos.process_code ;

select pos.position_id from material_process_assign mps join position pos on mps.position_id = pos.position_id where material_id = #{material_id} and sign_position_id = #{position_id} and prev_position_id = 0 and next_position_id = 0 order by pos.process_code ;
